newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine T-bill yields: 6-,12-18-mo down, 9-mo up.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine T-bill yields: 6-,12-18-mo down, 9-mo up.

text.p: Average yields at auctions of six-, 12- and 18-month treasury bills slipped and nine-month yields rose from the last sales, a central bank statement said on Friday.

Six-month bills eased to 20.20 percent from 20.22 percent, nine-month yields firmed to 28.18 percent from 28.16 percent, 12-month bills slipped to 30.38 percent from 30.46 percent, and 18-month bills fell to 32.33 percent from 32.47 percent.
The results of six-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume 15.00 million UAH 15.00 million UAH
Amount sold 15.00 million UAH 15.00 million UAH
Actual amount raised 13.63 million UAH 13.63 million UAH
The central bank sold 150,000 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of six-month discount T-bills is scheduled for July 1.
The results of the nine-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated 73.50 million UAH
Amount sold 75.84 million UAH 73.50 million UAH
Actual amount raised 62.63 million UAH 60.71 million UAH
The central bank sold 758,411 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of nine-month discount T-bills is scheduled for July 1.
The results of the 12-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated no limit stated
Amount sold 192.60 million UAH 130.68 million UAH
Actual amount raised 147.82 million UAH 100.23 million UAH
The central bank sold 1,925,965 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of 12-month discount T-bills is scheduled for July 1.
The results of the 18-month T-bill auction were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated no limit stated
Amount sold 88.38 million UAH 88.83 million UAH
Actual amount raised 59.57 million UAH 59.79 million UAH
The central bank sold 883,839 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of discount 18-month T-bills is is scheduled for July 1.
